title: Scrollbars should be disabled in ImageAnalyzer example
description: When viewing the ImageAnalyzer example, scrollbars are currently not disabled, which may lead to unnecessary scrolling and inconvenience for users.
OB: When viewing the ImageAnalyzer example, the scrollbars are enabled and can be scrolled.
EB: When viewing the ImageAnalyzer example, the scrollbars should be disabled and not allow scrolling.
SR:
1. Open the ImageAnalyzer example.
2. Notice that the scrollbars are enabled and can be scrolled.
3. The scrollbars should be disabled and not allow scrolling.
